data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article S, M A R C O S Tava R E, Pinheiro, Allysson P. (2011): A new species of Chaceon Manning & Holthuis, 1989, from the southwestern Atlantic, with a key to the western Atlantic species (Crustacea, Decapoda, Geryonidae). Zootaxa 3086: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205988
